name: bls-signatures-pod
summary: BLS signatures in C++, using the relic toolkit
description: Implements BLS signatures with aggregation as in Boneh, Drijvers, Neven 2018, using relic toolkit for cryptographic primitives (pairings, EC, hashing). The BLS12-381 curve is used.
prepare_command:
# build relic

curl -o contrib/relic/ios.toolchain.cmake https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leetal/ios-cmake/master/ios.toolchain.cmake >/dev/null

pushd contrib/relic

ARM_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-arm"
X86_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-x86"


mkdir "$ARM_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$ARM_TARGET_DIR"

export CC=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch arm64"
VERFLAGS="-mios-simulator-version-min=11.0"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS $VERFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=64 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" -DARCH=ARM -DOPSYS=NONE -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS64 -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=../ios.toolchain.cmake ../ >/dev/null
make >/dev/null

popd # "$ARM_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$X86_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$X86_TARGET_DIR"

unset CC
export CC=`xcrun --sdk macosx --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch x86_64"
VERFLAGS=""
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS $VERFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=64 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" ../ >/dev/null
make >/dev/null

popd # "$X86_TARGET_DIR"


xcrun lipo -create "${ARM_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" "${X86_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" -output "librelic_universal.a"

popd # contrib/relic
